content: --यामा {1} night (consisting of {3} watches or {%praharas%}, the first and last half {%prahara%} being excluded); संक्षिप्येत क्षण इव कथं दीर्घयामा त्रियामा <ls>Me. 108</ls>, <ls>Ku. 7. 21</ls>, <ls n="Ku. 7.">26</ls>; <ls>R. 9. 70</ls>, <ls>V. 3. 22.</ls> {2} turmeric. {3} the Indigo plant. {4} the river Yamunā.
